      • parseLine

        private java.lang.Object[] parseLine(java.lang.String line,
                                     java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> mapping)
        Parses a line into food or toy info to create prototype items Takes a line read from a data file, splits it, and then iterates along the columns. Maps the columns to data fields and then returns an object array of the information
        Parameters:
        line - String taken from either foodData or toyData files
        mapping - Mapping generated from the first line of columns to fields
        Returns:
        Object array in format {String name, String description, Integer price, Integer size, String[] speciesOrder, Intger[] increase}
